title: Appie
description: Appie is a responsive landing page for a fictional startup, showcasing my HTML and CSS skills, and responsive design.

title: Kanban Board
description: The project is a task management app featuring categories for not started, in progress, and completed tasks, with drag-and-drop functionality.

title: Salat Timer
description: The Salat Timer app is a React application designed to help users keep track of their daily prayers. It provides accurate prayer times based on location.

title: Button Component
description: This project is a reusable button component for React developers. It provides several customization options, such as color styles, button variants, and more...

title: YourCar
description: YourCar is a React-based landing page project that offers users a seamless experience for browsing and interacting with car products.
